name: (Gitans) include
description: The game is based on the Iron Kingdoms anime series, and features a third person perspective of a Soviet general who serves as a commander of the 4th Soviet Army. The limited edition game will shoot for an estimated retail price of only 1,495,000 (approximately US$39,000), but as a limited edition, you can get one for only US$54.80 (approximately US$2,500). For more information, watch the video below. The game has a release date of November 04, 2015, and the development team is so far seeking overseas players willing to support its development.
